name: MRS. SMITH'S FROZEN FOODS COMPANY, Petitioner, v. FREEZING EQUIPMENT SALES, INC., Toshiba International Corporation, Ram Motors and Control Company and Rego Company, Respondents
name_abbreviation: Mrs. Smith's Frozen Foods Co. v. Freezing Equipment Sales, Inc.

parties: MRS. SMITH’S FROZEN FOODS COMPANY, Petitioner, v. FREEZING EQUIPMENT SALES, INC., Toshiba International Corporation, Ram Motors and Control Company and Rego Company, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 3rd day of June, 1998, we Grant the petition for allowance of appeal, we REVERSE the order of the Superior Court, and we REMAND the matter to the Court of Common Pleas of Montgomery County consistent with this Court’s opinion in Schroeder v. Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Transportation, et al., 551 Pa. 243, 710 A.2d 23 (Pa.1998).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Stephen A. Cozen, Richard C. Glazer, Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, Philadelphia, for petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
709 A.2d 910
MRS. SMITH’S FROZEN FOODS COMPANY, Petitioner, v. FREEZING EQUIPMENT SALES, INC., Toshiba International Corporation, Ram Motors and Control Company and Rego Company, Respondents.
No. 0099 M.D. Allocatur Docket 1997.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 3, 1998.
Stephen A. Cozen, Richard C. Glazer, Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, Philadelphia, for petitioner.
